title: Building a Social App With Session Keys
description:
Join our hands-on workshop on building a social app with session keys!

Session keys combine the power of a unified onchain account with the UX benefits of an embedded wallet. In this workshop, we'll walk through:
- Writing session key-ready smart contracts for your social app.
- Creating a frontend for your app.
- Creating and using session keys to send transactions without popups.
- Using paymasters to sponsor gas for your users.
